archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0638
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to display interest free pricing based on logged in state in order to vary the price based on customer

properties.value: Customer can apply to go for interest free option and go through a credit check. If credit check fails, customer can only buy with full price or deposit is requested. OOTB functionality

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
